tool_description: Calculates comprehensive risk metrics for cryptocurrency portfolios including volatility, VaR, correlation analysis, and drawdown metrics.

asset_weights.description: Portfolio weights for each asset (should sum to 1.0)

historical_days.description: Days of historical data to use for risk calculations

risk_free_rate.description: Annual risk-free rate for Sharpe ratio calculation

error_messages: Array length mismatch: asset_symbols and asset_weights must have the same length.
Invalid portfolio weights: Weights must be positive and sum to approximately 1.0.
Confidence level out of range: confidence_level must be between 0.9 and 0.99.
Insufficient historical data: Not enough price history available for reliable risk calculations.
Risk calculation failed: Unable to compute risk metrics due to data quality issues.
usage: Provide asset_symbols and corresponding asset_weights that sum to 1.0. Configure historical_days for lookback period and confidence_level for VaR calculations. Returns comprehensive risk assessment.

value_at_risk.description: Value at Risk at specified confidence level

risk_contribution.description: Risk contribution of each asset to total portfolio risk
